Spootyman used to stream on KSP-TV, though he decided to go his own way a long time ago. Recently he’s been streaming Kerbal Space Program again and we’re glad to see him do it. Check out this recorded livestream and follow his channel at <a href="http://www.twitch.tv/spootyman/" target="_blank">http://www.twitch.tv/spootyman/</a>.

Well, that's odd.

"Audio for portions of this video has been muted as it appears to contain copyrighted content owned or controlled by a third party"

Well, that's odd.

"Audio for portions of this video has been muted as it appears to contain copyrighted content owned or controlled by a third party"

Agreed. Weird.... But, expected if someone does not want their meterial to be played.
